Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 35 points, 12 rebounds, and 15 assists. Russell Westbrook matched the MVP's triple-double with 25 points, 11 rebounds, and 10 assists.
Pre-Game Insights: Michael Malone expressed concerns about playing against a short-handed draft lottery team.
Post-Match Reflections: Malone mentioned that the game was scarier than playing against teams like Boston or Cleveland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets ended the first half on a 20-11 run, carried on with a 17-5 start to the second half, and finally pulled away with a 14-3 surge in the last six minutes.
Others: The Nuggets (22-15) played with their food but stretched. But they ended the first half on a 20-11 run, carried on with a 17-5 start to the second half and finally pulled away with a 14-3 surge in the last six minutes.
